alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 02 at 8:46PM CST until February 05 at 7:30PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Calcasieu River Near Kinder Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Oakdale Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau Sabine River Near Deweyville Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Hawks Road near the gauge becomes flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Thursday the stage was 14.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 18.6 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Bayou Anacoco Rosepine 17.0 14.7 Thu 7 pm CST 18.2 18.2 15.7 &&
